name: Gregor Ioannou
story: Achilleas joined the military straight out of high school, desperate to escape the mundane life his small town had to offer. He quickly rose through the ranks, impressing his superiors with his sharpshooting abilities. He met his wife, Maria, while on leave and they have been inseparable ever since. Despite his tough exterior, Achilleas is a devoted husband and often thinks of Maria while on missions. He hopes to retire from the military someday and start a family with her.
